instructions: Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone. Tap My Watch, tap General, then turn off Automatic App Install. Tap My Watch, then scroll down to Available Apps. Tap Install next to the apps you want to install.
Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone. Tap App Store to browse Apple Watch apps. Tap the purchase button to download the app.
Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone. Tap My Watch, then scroll down to see apps you installed. Tap an app to change its settings.
Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone. Tap My Watch, then go to General > Usage.
